int.label: DirichletStrategy
int.desc: Method for enforcement of Dirichlet BCs [11..14]

int.label: DirichletValues
int.desc: Method for computation of Dirichlet DoF values [100..103]

int.label: InterfaceStrategy
int.desc: Method of treatment of patch interfaces [0..3]

real.label: bdA
real.desc: Estimated nonzeros per column of the matrix: bdA*deg + bdB

int.label: bdB
int.desc: Estimated nonzeros per column of the matrix: bdA*deg + bdB

real.label: bdO
real.desc: Overhead of sparse mem. allocation: (1+bdO)(bdA*deg + bdB) [0..1]

real.label: quA
real.desc: Number of quadrature points: quA*deg + quB

int.label: quB
int.desc: Number of quadrature points: quA*deg + quB

int.label: quRule
int.desc: Quadrature rule [1:GaussLegendre,2:GaussLobatto]

int.label: CFactor
int.desc: Coarsening factor of the parallel-in-time multigrid solver

int.label: access
int.desc: Access level (never [=0], =after finished [=1(default)], each iteration [=2]

int.label: maxIter
int.desc: Maximum iteration numbers of the parallel-in-time multigrid solver

int.label: maxLevel
int.desc: Maximum numbers of parallel-in-time multigrid levels

int.label: minCLevel
int.desc: Minimum level of the parallel-in-time multigrid solver

int.label: norm
int.desc: Temporal norm of the parallel-in-time multigrid solver (1-norm [=1], 2-norm [=2(default)], inf-norm [=3])

int.label: numFMG
int.desc: Number of full multigrid steps of the parallel-in-time multigrid solver

int.label: numFMGVcyc
int.desc: Number of full multigrid V-cycles of the parallel-in-time multigrid solver

int.label: numMaxRef
int.desc: Maximum number of refinements of the parallel-in-time multigrid solver

int.label: numRelax
int.desc: Number of relaxation steps of the parallel-in-time multigrid solver

int.label: numStorage
int.desc: Number of storage of the parallel-in-time multigrid solver

int.label: print
int.desc: Print level (no output [=0], runtime inforation [=1], run statistics [=2(default)], debug [=3])

real.label: absTol
real.desc: Absolute tolerance of the parallel-in-time multigrid solver

real.label: relTol
real.desc: Relative tolerance of the parallel-in-time multigrid solver

bool.label: incrMaxLevels
bool.desc: Increase the maximum number of parallel-in-time multigrid levels after performing a refinement (default is off)

bool.label: sequential
bool.desc: Set the initial guess of the parallel-in-time multigrid solver as the sequential time stepping solution (default is off)

bool.label: skip
bool.desc: Skip all work on the first down cycle of the parallel-in-time multigrid solver (default on)

bool.label: spatial
bool.desc: Perform spatial coarsening and refinement (default is off)

int.label: coarseOperator
int.desc: Type of coarse operator in h-multigrid: (1) Rediscretization (2) Galerkin Projection

int.label: cycle_h
int.desc: Type of cycle in h-multigrid, V-cycle (1) or W-cycle (2)

int.label: cycle_p
int.desc: Type of cycle in p-multigrid, V-cycle (1) or W-cycle (2)

int.label: lumping
int.desc: Restriction and Prolongation performed with the lumped (1) or consistent (2) mass matrix

int.label: maxIter
int.desc: Maximum number of iterations

int.label: numLevels
int.desc: Number of levels in multigrid method

int.label: numSmoothing
int.desc: Number of pre/post smoothing steps

int.label: projection
int.desc: Direct projection on coarsest level (1) or via all other levels (2)

int.label: smoother
int.desc: Type of smoother: (1) ILUT (2) Gauss-Seidel (3) SCMS (4) Block ILUT (5) Block Gauss-Seidel

int.label: bcHandling
int.desc: Type of boundary handling: (1) elimination (2) Nitsche
